visual.name: bubbleComparisonChart
visual.description: A Bubble Comparison Chart is a data visualization method that employs circles or bubbles to represent data points, making it easier to compare and contrast information.  Each bubble's size typically corresponds to a specific data value and by using color, these charts conveies multiple layers of information simultaneously. Bubble Comparison Charts are especially effective when you want to highlight relationships, trends, or variations within a dataset, making them a valuable tool for data analysis and decision-making.
